column1: Hence, the provisions of ‘P16’ cannot serve as an automatic impediment to the
Petitioner’s promotion to the rank of Brigadier. In the said circumstances, it is
the view of this Court that the Army Selection Board No.2 acted unreasonably

column2: it  applied  ‘P16’  to  the  Petitioner.  Similarly,  the  4th  Respondent,  the

column1: Military Secretary erred when he took the Petitioner’s absence without leave

column2:
in  his 
letter  dated  16th  February  2018,  the  contents  of

column1: which were communicated to the Petitioner by the 2nd Respondent.
